Row.Text: The Fallout Shelter is an American Unique Building, replacing the Bomb Shelter. Fallout Shelters reduce population loss from a nuclear attack on this city by 100%, as well as adding 10 to the city's defense and hit points. Bring it on Gandhi!
Reduces population loss from nuclear attack by 100%, and adds 10 to the city's defense and hit points.

As the name implies, a fallout shelter is a structure designed to withstand damage from bombs and other explosive weapons. While some fallout shelters were meant for protection from aerial bombardment, others were constructed underground in the hopes of surviving a nuclear attack. Depending on the intended purpose of the shelter, various materials could be used, with the most common component being reinforced concrete.
